The MLS is Back Tournament in Orlando kicks off on July 8, exactly four months since the last official MLS match played on March 8 due to the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic.

articles.title: 11 Times KLOPP Would Have Been SACKED At Other Clubs - HITC Sport
articles.description: The Irish Guy takes a look at the 11 disastrous Liverpool moments that could have had Jurgen Klopp sacked at other clubs.
